rukus.text: Pered shcho, my harantuvaly Abraham yoho kerivnytstvo ta rozuminnya, dlya my znaly tsilkom yoho
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "Yaki tsi statuyi kotryy vy prysvyachuyete sebe
Vony skazaly, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv obozhnyuyuchi yim
Vin skazav, "Diysno, vy ta vashi batʹky poyikhaly povnistyu astray
Vony skazaly, vy rozpovidayete nam pravdu, abo hrayuchi vy
Vin skazav, "Vash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Lorda neba ta zemli, khto utvoryv yikh. Tse yavlyaye soboyu svidchennya kotryy ya dayu svidchennya
ya prysyahayu BOHOM, ya mayu plan maty spravu z vashi statuyi, yak tilʹky vy lyshayete
Vin rozbyv yikh u shmatky, krim protyahom velykoho, shcho vony mozhutʹ zvernutysya do tse
Vony skazaly, "Whoever zrobyly tse do nashykh bohiv ye diysno porushnyk
Vony skazaly, "My pochuly molodʹ zahrozhuyemo yim; vin zaklykayetʹsya Abraham
Vony skazaly, "Prynosyatʹ yomu pered ochamy vsikh lyudey, shcho vony mozhutʹ davaty svidchennya
Vony skazaly, vy zrobyly tse do nashykh bohiv, O Abraham
Vin skazav, "Tse shcho velykyy odyn khto zrobyv tse. Poyidʹte prosyatʹ yikh, yakshcho vony mozhutʹ rozmovlyaty
Vony buly zakhopleni znenatsʹka, ta buly skazani sebe, "Diysno, vy yavlyayete soboyu khto porushuvav
Dosi, vony pereyshly do yikhnikh starykh idey: "Vy znayete povnyy dobre shcho tsey ne mozhete rozmovlyaty
Vin skazav, vy todi obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA shcho volodiye niyakoyu potuzhnistyu do vyhody vy abo shkoda vy
Vy zaznaly soromu obozhnyuyuchy idoliv bilya BOHA. Vy ne rozumiyete
Vony skazaly, "Horyatʹ yo ta pidtrymuyutʹ vashykh bohiv, yakshcho tse ye shcho vy vyrishyte zrobyty
My skazaly, "O vohonʹ, budemo prokholodnyy ta seyf dlya Abraham
Otzhe, vony zamyslyly proty yoho, ale my zrobyly yim losers
My vryatuvaly yoho, ta my vryatuvaly Dolyu, do zemelʹnykh shcho my blahoslovyly dlya vsikh lyudey
Ta my harantuvaly yomu Isaac ta Jacob yak darunok, ta my zrobyly yim obydva spravedlyvym

My zrobyly yim imams kotri kerovanyy u vidpovidnosti do nashykh zapovidey, ta my navchyly yikh yak popratsyuvaty righteousness, ta yak zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat). Do nas, vony buly prysvyacheni worshipers
Yak dlya Doli, my harantuvaly yomu wisdom ta znannya, ta my vryatuvaly yoho z spilʹnoty shcho practiced abominations; vony buly bezputni ta z·hubni lyudy
My dopuskaly yoho u nashe myloserdya, dlya vin buv spravedlyvyy
